products.name: Smart Drone X1
products.description: The Smart Drone X1 offers a 4K camera, 30-minute flight time, and advanced GPS follow-me features, making it the perfect choice for both beginners and professional photographers.
products.summary: A top-tier 4K drone with excellent battery life and user-friendly controls.

faqs.question: What is the maximum flight range?
faqs.answer: The maximum flight range is approximately 5 kilometers under ideal conditions.

faqs.question: Is it waterproof?
faqs.answer: No, the Smart Drone X1 is not waterproof. Avoid flying in rain or near bodies of water.

products.name: Audiophile Headphones Pro
products.description: Experience unparalleled sound clarity with the Audiophile Headphones Pro. Featuring noise-cancellation technology and a 40-hour battery life, they are designed for the ultimate listening session.
products.summary: Premium noise-cancelling headphones with long battery life and superior sound.

faqs.question: Do they come with a case?
faqs.answer: Yes, a premium hard-shell travel case is included.
